sentences.sContent: Garlic aids in the digestion of fats and oils, lowers blood pressure, prevents arteriosclerosis, and lowers cholesterol levels.
sentences.sContent_eng: Garlic aids in the digestion of fats and oils, lowers blood pressure, prevents arteriosclerosis, and lowers cholesterol levels.
sentences.sCn: 大蒜具有帮助消化脂肪和油脂，降低血压，防止动脉硬化和降低固醇水平的功能。

sentences.sContent: If this high concentration of blood sugar continues for a long period, it will affect the vascular system and cause serious diseases including arteriosclerosis and retinal hemorrhages.
sentences.sContent_eng: If this high concentration of blood sugar continues for a long period, it will affect the vascular system and cause serious diseases including arteriosclerosis and retinal hemorrhages.
sentences.sCn: 如果这种高血糖浓度状况持续一段长时期，将影响到血管系统并导致包括动脉硬化和视网膜出血在内的严重疾病。

sentences.sContent: Finally, lower your daily intake of salt, which will minimize your risk of arteriosclerosis.
sentences.sContent_eng: Finally, lower your daily intake of salt, which will minimize your risk of arteriosclerosis.
sentences.sCn: 最后，每天减少盐的摄入量，可以减小动脉硬化的危险。
